objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 25x4.7, 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 4 line(s) per column, 25-29 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Excavated 1896-1907 by Bernard Grenfell and Arthur Hunt, Egypt Exploration Society at Al Bahnasā, Miṣr from a garbage dump.
Loaned to University of Oxford, Ashmolean Museum of Art and Archaeology at Oxford, England.
Moved 2001 to University of Oxford, Sackler Library at Oxford, England.

msIdentifier.msName: P. Oxy. 5073, University of Oxford, Sackler Library, Oxford, England.

sourceDesc.bibl: Smith, G. S. and A. E. Bernhard, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri, vol. 76, no. 5073, Egypt Exploration Society: London, England, 2011. OCLC 855777953.
